landing.welcome_text: Monitoring your financial activities has never been so fun. Say goodbye to boring spreadsheets and hello to dynamic, engaging, and intelligent financial tracking!
landing.expenses_text: Keep a keen eye on your cash with our exceptional expenses tracking system!
landing.income_text: Follow the inflow of your cash with our top-notch income monitor.
landing.crypto_text: Integrate your crypto wallets and track their performance—crypto isn‘t the future, it‘s today.
landing.crypto_text-2: Our system accurately portrays your crypto growth and losses, making your decision-making process that much easier.
landing.signed_in_text: Go ahead and take control of your financial destiny.
landing.signed_out_text: Ready to take control of your financial destiny? Don‘t sleep on it—your medium of financial tracking just got an upgrade!
